'''John Stahl''' (born 1953 in Sauchie, Clackmannanshire, Scotland) is a Scottish actor, arguably best known for playing the recurring character of Quinn on the second season of ''[[wikipedia:Being Human (TV series)|Being Human]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Rickard Karstark]], starting in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He replaces [[Steven Blount]], who was announced in the role, but was not identified by name on screen. [[George R.R. Martin]] confirmed him in the role on 13 October 2011.<ref>[http://grrm.livejournal.com/243470.html George R.R. Martin's blog]</ref> He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
